arStrings.szText: {c_important}Counterattack's{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}[{SF_8}|1|]{/c} seconds per stack of {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} you have.
When you Dodge a Control Impairing attack with {c_important}Counterattack{/c} it will reflect that Crowd Control to all Close enemies for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Counterattack{/c} passively increases your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%x|]{/c} for every Close enemy, up to {c_number}[{SF_10}*{SF_19}*100|%x|]{/c}.
